description: Home Security Intelligence - Analytics Dashboard for events, detections, and risk analysis

panels.description: Shows detection counts aggregated by day for the last 7 days. This panel uses a fixed 7-day time range regardless of dashboard time picker selection, as the backend API returns daily aggregates for the last 7 days.
panels.title: Detection Trend Over Time

panels.description: Current number of active user sessions

panels.description: Largest Contentful Paint - measures loading performance. Good: <2.5s, Needs Improvement: 2.5-4s, Poor: >4s
panels.title: LCP (Largest Contentful Paint)

panels.description: First Input Delay - measures interactivity. Good: <100ms, Needs Improvement: 100-300ms, Poor: >300ms
panels.title: FID (First Input Delay)

panels.description: Cumulative Layout Shift - measures visual stability. Good: <0.1, Needs Improvement: 0.1-0.25, Poor: >0.25
panels.title: CLS (Cumulative Layout Shift)

panels.description: Interaction to Next Paint - measures responsiveness. Good: <200ms, Needs Improvement: 200-500ms, Poor: >500ms
panels.title: INP (Interaction to Next Paint)

options.content:
### A/B Testing & Experimentation Guide

**A/B Test Configuration:**
- Experiments are configured via `/api/admin/experiments` endpoint
- Traffic split is controlled by `hsi_ab_traffic_split` metric (default 50/50)
- Minimum sample size for statistical significance: 1000 events per variant

**Statistical Significance Interpretation:**
| P-Value | Confidence Level | Recommendation |
|---------|------------------|----------------|
| <0.01 | 99% | Strong evidence - safe to deploy winner |
| 0.01-0.05 | 95% | Significant - consider deployment |
| 0.05-0.10 | 90% | Weak evidence - extend experiment |
| >0.10 | <90% | Not significant - need more data |

**Conversion Metrics:**
- Primary: Risk score accuracy (agreement with human review)
- Secondary: Processing latency, token cost per event

panels.description: List of currently active A/B test experiments
panels.title: Active Experiments

panels.description: Traffic distribution across experiment variants
panels.title: Traffic Distribution

panels.description: Conversion rate comparison across experiment variants
panels.title: Conversion by Variant

options.content:
### Shadow Prompt Comparison Methodology

**How Shadow Testing Works:**
1. Production prompt processes events and returns risk scores (visible to users)
2. Shadow prompt runs in parallel on same events (not visible to users)
3. Both results are logged for comparison without affecting production

**Key Comparison Metrics:**
- **Accuracy**: Agreement with human-reviewed ground truth labels
- **Response Time Difference**: Shadow vs production latency gap
- **Agreement Rate**: How often shadow and production agree on risk level

**Promotion Criteria for Shadow -> Production:**
| Metric | Threshold | Notes |
|--------|-----------|-------|
| Accuracy Delta | Shadow >= Production | Shadow must match or exceed |
| Agreement Rate | >80% | High disagreement needs investigation |
| Latency Delta | <20% slower | Performance regression check |
| Sample Size | >5000 events | Minimum for reliable comparison |

**Use `/api/admin/prompts/promote` to swap shadow into production after validation.**

panels.title: Shadow vs Production Accuracy
